tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: type
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Type of the button. As default it is null. Available types: primary, secondary, destructive, start, mode

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: contentText
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Required. Specifies the content that will be part of the link. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: contentHTML
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Required. Uses HTML to specifies what content is going to be linked.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: link
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Required. Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: linkTitle
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Required. The link title attribute gives additional information about the page being linked to.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: linkTarget
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Specifies where to open the linked document. Defaults to _self that means it opens in the same tab.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: classes
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Specifies what class modifiers to apply to link component.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: iconLeft
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Specified the name of the left icon, which will be used to import icon and place it on the left side of the button, before text. Icon names can be found on the icons page.

tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.name: iconRight
tfwmdsLinkAsButtonProps.description: Specifies the name of the right icon, which will be used to import icon and place it on the right side of the button, after text. Icon names can be found on the icons page.
